chapter.title: Known Issues and Caveats
chapter.subtitle: Known Problems And Workarounds In This Release
chapter.para: Here is the list of known issues in this release of OpenNMS.

sect1.title: Rare Incorrect Entries in the Outage Table
sect1.para: Rarely, a service will show on the outage table that is actually operational. Investigation will show that the event that resolved the outage was written to the database at the same time as the event that caused the outage. This is due to the database being temporarily busy, and the "up" event getting into the queue just ahead of the "down" event, and occurs especially during a "vacuumdb". A fix is in process.
